# Cache constants

* `CACHE_TTL_1_MINUTE`
* `CACHE_TTL_5_MINUTES`
* `CACHE_TTL_10_MINUTES`
* `CACHE_TTL_30_MINUTES`
* `CACHE_TTL_1_HOUR`
* `CACHE_TTL_2_HOURS`
* `CACHE_TTL_6_HOURS`
* `CACHE_TTL_12_HOURS`
* `CACHE_TTL_1_DAY`
* `CACHE_TTL_2_DAYS`
* `CACHE_TTL_3_DAYS`
* `CACHE_TTL_5_DAYS`
* `CACHE_TTL_1_WEEK`
* `CACHE_TTL_2_WEEKS`
* `CACHE_TTL_1_MONTH`



* `CACHE_TTL_MINIMAL` 10 seconds
* `CACHE_TTL_CRITICAL` 1 minute
* `CACHE_TTL_SHORT` 5 minutes
* `CACHE_TTL_NORMAL` 1 hour
* `CACHE_TTL_UNCRITICAL` 1 day
* `CACHE_TTL_LONG` 1 week
* `CACHE_TTL_LONGEST` 1 month
